title: fast, furious and slanted...
content:
Hi TT, Aside from the distress and obliqueness of these glyphs - any suggestion for the base font?

Big thanks in advance people!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415105348im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rsu_3846.jpg)
author: Rand

comments.content: It looks close to **[Venus Envy (Black Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415105348/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=TypeArt%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=VenusEnvy%20-%20ItalicBold&fid=086a882d18391f2f70a03a381c6325bd&fsize=60&text=RSU&fit=1)** by TypeArt [2000]
